views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 3 - 10.2
Use your keyboard to respring,enter safe mode,hide the keyboard or reboot the device.

Commands :
.respring : restarts springboard
.reboot:reboots the device
.safemode : enters safe mode
.hide : hides keyboard

No options to configure.

No Screenshots for this item.

-Only for iOS 8-10.2.1 users : Added option to enable/disable every command. -Only for iOS 8-10.2 users: Added preferences and .hide to hide keyboard. -Fixed a bug that was making the tweak not to work for some devices
-Replaced . with & for iOS 7 and lower so now you have to type &respring or &safemode.(reboot is temporarily removed)
-Added an alert instead of immediate respring,safe mode or reboot
